title: Testing Django Projects at Scale
summary: Tests are extremely useful to developers, but as projects get larger, tests can begin to get in the way of a smooth delivery pipeline. In this talk I present some issues I have experienced, and offer 10 pragmatic guidelines that may help developers maximize their test usefulness.
